adDetails: I am a third year UC Hastings law student. I can ) prepare and respond to discovery requests; ) prepare complaints; ) prepare answers to complaints and demurrers; ) research court authorities; ) access PACER database; ) written and oral attorney correspondence; ) prepare legal memoranda; ) briefs and law motions such as motions to compel; ) requests for admissions; ) response to interrogatories; ) preparing and filing court documents; ) client interviews and correspondence; ) drafting demand letters: Fast turnaround. Reasonable rates. References furnished upon request.
